law.text: Every duty under KRS 383.505 to 383.715 and every act which must be performed as a condition precedent to the exercise of a right or remedy under KRS 383.505 to 383.715 imposes an obligation of good faith in its performance or enforcement.
law.history: Repealed and reenacted 1984 Ky. Acts ch. 176, sec. 10, effective July 13, 1984. -- Created 1974 Ky. Acts ch. 378, sec. 11.
